Package nsu.odnostorontseva

Class BlackJack

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsu.odnostorontseva.BlackJack
  • public class BlackJack
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Game class that simulates a simple game of Blackjack between a player and a dealer. It handles the game flow, player and dealer actions, and keeps track of the score.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BlackJack()
      initializing the game state and starts the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void playGame()
      main game loop that controls the flow of the game.
      void startRound​(java.util.Scanner scanner)
      starts a new round of Blackjack.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlackJack

        public BlackJack()
        initializing the game state and starts the game. It initializes the decks, shuffles the cards, and sets up the player and dealer.

    • Method Detail

      • playGame

        public void playGame()
        main game loop that controls the flow of the game. before each round, the player is asked if they want to continue playing. if the player chooses not to continue, the game ends.

      • startRound

        public void startRound​(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        starts a new round of Blackjack. this method handles the card dealing, player and dealer actions, and determines the result of the round.
        Parameters:
        scanner - (сканер для пользовательского ввода).
